00095             function                fetch_data( $Options )
00096             {
00097                   try
00098                   {
00099                         $FileName = $this->Security->get_gp( 'data' , 'command' );                    
00100                         $this->Settings->load_file( dirname( __FILE__ )."/conf/cf_$FileName" );
00101                         
00102                         $PackageName = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'access_package_name' );
00103                         $PackageVersion = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'access_package_version' , 'last' );
00104                         
00105                         $Provider = get_package( $PackageName , $PackageVersion , __FILE__ );
00106                         
00107                         $FunctionName = $this->Settings->get_setting( 'select_func' , 'select' );
00108                         
00109                         $Records = call_user_func( 
00110                               array( $Provider , $FunctionName ) , 
00111                               $this->Security->get_gp( 'start' , 'integer' , false ) , 
00112                               $this->Security->get_gp( 'limit' , 'integer' , 21 ) , 
00113                               $this->Security->get_gp( 'field' , 'command' , false ) , 
00114                               $this->Security->get_gp( 'order' , 'command' , false )
00115                         );
00116                         
00117                         $JSON = get_package( 'json' , 'last' , __FILE__ );
00118                         
00119                         $this->Output = $JSON->encode( $Records );
00120                   }
00121                   catch( Exception $e )
00122                   {
00123                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00124                   }
00125             }
00126             
00149             function                view( $Options )
00150             {
00151                   try
00152                   {
00153                         $this->fetch_data( $Options );
00154                         
00155                         return( $this->Output );
00156                   }
00157                   catch( Exception $e )
00158                   {
00159                         $a = func_get_args();_throw_exception_object( __METHOD__ , $a , $e );
00160                   }
00161             }
